name: Legacy Of Embers - June 2021 Demo
description:
Preface

This is a demo of a much larger game we aspire to build! We will be releasing patches and content updates somewhat frequently. Please leave any feedback you have in the comments as it will be instrumental in bringing the game to its full potential. Thank you so much for playing!

Description

Legacy of Embers is a tactical RPG set in a world where peculiar gem fragments emanate immense power. For this demo, the fragments - known as Embers - can be used to craft unique Bots during battle to assist with taking down a set of three nefarious wanderers. Strategize and shoot your way to victory as you take your first step in discovering the mysteries and complexities of the Embers.

With this release, TheIndieDream formally welcomes Curtis Gaudet to our game development group! Curtis is a 3D artist, animator, graphic designer, and game designer. We look forward to bringing you awesome new games! Check out our profile page to learn more about Curtis and the rest of TheIndieDream crew.
